page.title: 05INDUSTRY MINING GRAVEL SAND
page.content: The gravel pits at Tattershall turn out{100,000 tons of gravel per year. The area is now owned by R.M.C.(Ready Mixed Concrete)It used to be owned by Mr. Dickinson.He opened it in the 1930,s.the first gravel pit was started next to Tattershall Castle. Most of the gravel goes to their company.The gravel pits in Tattershall have 11 men working there.Summer is the busiest season for the gravel pits.They have a rival company in Woodhall Spa.5 lorries carry the gravel at Tattershall.A 6 wheeler lorry weighs 24 T. and an 8 wheeler lorry weighs 30 T..The gravel at Tattershall has flint in it.{Lots of {old bones have been found in gravel {pits at Tattershall dating from around {10,000 years ago and they are mainly {bison,mammoth,etc........ { }
